title: can you guys just like remove yasuo from the game?

replies.body:
The {{champion:157}}  hate bandwagon is real. There are many more problems present in the game which have higher priority. 
***Cough***
**Minion block**
***Cough***
Edit: Ironically, I neglected to realize that {{champion:157}} doesn't face this problem.
{{champion:157}} It's easy, just press E on all the minions. Problem solved.

> [{quoted}](name=Volgorath,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kN1qJ4Ut,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-11-02T00:06:25.964+0000)
>
> The {{champion:157}}  hate bandwagon is real. There are many more problems present in the game which have higher priority. 
> ***Cough***
> **Minion block**
> ***Cough***

yeah well theres a science behind minion block while theres no science on how a champion can be strong throughout the entire match and then theres a champion like pantheon who falls off harder than a meteor smashing into the earth
Why? You are months late to the bandwagon.
Name Checks Out

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kN1qJ4Ut,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-01T23:50:31.723+0000)
>
> Why? You are months late to the bandwagon.

because no one likes him. just look at the boards
I love yasuo. So there

Can you just like get better at the game and not complain when a champion beats you?

No, I don't main Yasuo, and yes, I find him iritating at times. But I know how to beat him and I play around it.

Dude you have only won trough luck of bad opponents. A yasuo has no counters no counterplay nothing to save you. Even CC.
Cause you know this is ok if it's a 1v5

He has 4 other people. Remember that ?

Just because you won against a bad yasuo doesn't make you good. 
So chill out and challenge a good yasuo. No the best not a master justa good yasuo, then cry yourself to sleeo when he Hasagi you to oblivion !
Where's your kappa? If you're dead serious then you should get your brain checked out.

About 70% of times there's a Yasuo in my game (on either team) he's feeding his edgelord butt off whilst raging in allchat and spamming mastery emotes at every "HASAGI!".  It's not about how good he is, it's about how obnoxious he is. And his mains too.

> [{quoted}](name=AvantelWings,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kN1qJ4Ut,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-01T23:58:55.909+0000)
>
> Can you just like get better at the game and not complain when a champion beats you?
> 
> No, I don't main Yasuo, and yes, I find him iritating at times. But I know how to beat him and I play around it.

when have I complained about him beating me? i just asked if riot could remove him from the game because hes irritating
No.
Oh hey. Yasuo circlejerk posts are back.
i love how a 0 effort thread gets upvotes just because of yasuo hate

Learn How to play against him before you make a stupid post.

I can help if you'd like.
lol. its funny how you asked it.
I thought they were (10 bans :P)?
Sorry, my ban will be reserved for Blitzcrank. Nobody will be grabbing nobody when I'm around.
for what purpose?
No, but I wish they could.
he sounds annoying when he use his e like srsly
No.
